addstaff.brief: Adds staff with given discord ID to DB.
addstaff.description: This command can be used to add new staff to the database. This is required if you want the bot to interact with a newly introduced staffmember.

usage.e: Discord ID of the staffmember you want to add.

addchapter.brief: Adds a chapter to the database
addchapter.description:
Add a chapter to the database. Requires raws to do so, as well as a project it belongs to.
 Aliases: `addc, addch, ac`

addproject.brief: Adds a project to the database. Requires role `Neko Herder`.
addproject.description:
Add a project to the database. Requires role `Neko Herder`.
 Aliases: `addp, addproj, ap`

usage.e: Project's status (mostly either active or inactive) - **REQUIRED**
Alternative project titles, separated by comma - **REQUIRED**
Link to small icon next to the title in the board entry.
Link to thumbnail in the board entry.

infochapter.brief: Retrieve information about one or multiple chapters. Requires role `Neko Herder`.
infochapter.description:
Display information about chapters in form of a table,
which is either sent as an image or as plain text. Requires role `Neko Herder`.
 Aliases: `infochapters, infoc, ic`

usage.e: Chapters with numbers from this point on
Chapters with numbers up to this point
Filter by link, if you ever wanted to
Filter by date. Identical commands exist for `ts, rd, pr, qcts and rl`
Can be either `image` or `text`. Defaults to `image`.
Possible values: `title, id, link_{step}, tl, rd, ts, pr, d_c (date it was created on), d_{step} (Date)`
